scripts.reset-db:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development knex --knexfile backend/knexfile.js migrate:rollback --all && knex --knexfile backend/knexfile.js migrate:latest && knex --knexfile backend/knexfile.js seed:run
scripts.reset-db:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production knex --knexfile backend/knexfile.js migrate:rollback --all && knex --knexfile backend/knexfile.js migrate:latest && knex --knexfile backend/knexfile.js seed:run
scripts.dev:init: npm run init-db && npm run dev
scripts.prod:init: npm run init-db:prod && npm run prod
scripts.prod: npm run build && npm run start:prod
